abstract: How the latest sexual harassment charges could reshape the Republican presidential contest.
snippet: How the latest sexual harassment charges could reshape the Republican presidential contest.
lead_paragraph: The political impact of the accusations leveled against Herman Cain is difficult to assess in the early hours after they surfaced. But the allegations -- and the reactions to them -- have the potential to reshape the dynamics of the Republican presidential contest.

headline.main: Cain Faces Allegations, and Now, the Possible Repercussions
